程序包 com.owl.downloader.event

接口 EventHandler

  • 函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface EventHandler
    Event handler, called by Dispatcher when an event occur
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Ricardo Evans
    另请参阅:
    Dispatcher

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      boolean handle​(Event event, Task task, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Called when an event occur

    • 方法详细资料

      • handle

        boolean handle​(Event event,
               Task task,
               java.lang.Exception exception)
        Called when an event occur
        参数:
        event - the event type
        task - the task where the event occur
        exception - any exception related if exist
        返回:
        whether this handler handle the event, which means the following handler will not receive the event if true is returned
